content: Hey @Léo Lanteri Thauvin -- I'm inclined to call this a lang-team initiative, I think, even though it's kind of a compiler team one too :)
I am wondeing if it is useful to have a repo to track state

Sorry, I'm not the right person to ask :big_smile:

People who have been involved in the discussions surrounding #80059 and #87520 on Github and topic "union field semantics and safety" might be interested however.
